abstract: A bakery in Ferguson, Mo., raises $250,000 through crowdfunding. How to avoid making rookie legal mistakes. And French business owners stage protests across the country.
snippet: A bakery in Ferguson, Mo., raises $250,000 through crowdfunding. How to avoid making rookie legal mistakes. And French business owners stage protests across the country.
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Advance Ticketing for Restaurants
